headline: EALING ELECTRO-OPTICS VARIABLE NEUTRAL DENSITY FILTER
description: Variable Neutral Density Filter  Ealing Electro-Optic 22-8981
keywords: damp rods jacks rods mirror holders mounts plates posts gimble lens mount rail carrier adpter clamp base bracket diaphrams carriers
specstable:
Manufacturer Ealing Electro-Optic
Model 22-8981
Type Filter, Variable Neutral Density
Other Information

75mm glass filter
Fits on any 13.7mm diameter pin.
Outer protective meal ring is marked every 5 degrees for positional reference.
The filter density varies linearly from zero to approximately 2 over a 330 degree arc.

Condition Very Good
